name: Hindustani Classical Music
description: North Indian traditional music (including parts of Pakistan, Afghanistan, Nepal, Bangladesh, and Bhutan) with roots reaching back to the 12th century CE.

children.name: Dhrupad
children.description: Ancient style of classical Hindustani vocal and instrumental music.

children.name: Dhrupad
children.description: Ancient style of classical Hindustani vocal and instrumental music.

children.name: Kafi
children.description: Sufi vocal style popular in Pakistan, differentiated from Qawwali by its small ensemble size and simple arrangements.

children.name: Kafi
children.description: Sufi vocal style popular in Pakistan, differentiated from Qawwali by its small ensemble size and simple arrangements.

children.name: Khayal
children.description: Predominant vocal style, often with a significant amount of improvisation.

children.name: Khayal
children.description: Predominant vocal style, often with a significant amount of improvisation.

children.name: Klasik
children.description: Encompassing the various styles of Afghan Classical Music, which diverged from the North Indian styles.

children.name: Klasik
children.description: Encompassing the various styles of Afghan Classical Music, which diverged from the North Indian styles.

children.name: Qawwali
children.description: Sufi Music in India and Pakistan using the raga and tala templates of Hindustani Classical Music.

children.name: Qawwali
children.description: Sufi Music in India and Pakistan using the raga and tala templates of Hindustani Classical Music.

children.name: Shabad kirtan
children.description: Religious Sikh Hymns backed by specially selected ragas and taal.

children.name: Shabad kirtan
children.description: Religious Sikh Hymns backed by specially selected ragas and taal.

children.name: Tarana
children.description: Vocal composition with Persian or Arabic syllables and phonemes.

children.description: Vocal composition with Persian or Arabic syllables and phonemes.

children.name: Thumri
children.description: Hindustani classical style based on North Indian folk literature.
